column4: why did http://www.ubuntu.com/getubuntu/download stop offering Ubuntu 6.10 as a download?  They onlu have 6.06 and 7.04. Anyone know?
can ubuntu 7.04 run without a swap file?
i use 2GB swap, to be on the safe side ... =)
the desktop cd just contains the most common install options
yeah true!  and the desktop wouldnt install for me at all, but when I tried the  the alternate disk it installed fine
I didnt ask for any recommendations or links. I asked "has anyone here got BattleField 2141 to run and work on Fesity just using Wine?"
I was seeking a Yes or No
most questions in this channel start with "does anyone..." i was doing my best to be helpful, i did not know if you knew about that site
